articles.content: Amid a spike in US bond yields, the rupee on Wednesday ended at a fresh record low of 81.94 against the US dollar. The domestic currency has already depreciated around 9% against the greenback so far… [+2450 chars]

articles.author: Sreeradha Basu and Maulik Vyas
articles.title: IT firms reach out for legal help to address moonlighting among staff - Economic Times
articles.description: Anshul Prakash, partner, employment labour & benefits at Khaitan & Co, said the number of companies that have reached out to them in the last two-three months runs into double digits.
articles.content: The furore around moonlighting which has left India Inc divided is now pushing companies, led by IT/ITeS and technology players, to seek legal help to re-evaluate and redraft existing employment cont… [+4102 chars]

articles.author: Sagar
articles.title: India to mandate NavIC support for smartphones, no timeline decided - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The government wants to reduce dependence on foreign navigation systems.
articles.content:
The Indian government is pushing handset makers to enable support for its homegrown navigation system NavIC on the smartphones they will sell in India from January 1, 2023, reports Reuters.

articles.title: Byju's last 6 months toughest in last 10 years, says co-founder-wife - YourStory

articles.title: IT employees working from home lazy and slacking? CEO Satya Nadella says Microsoft managers feel it is true - India Today
articles.description: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella now shares his thoughts on work-from-home culture. Microsoft currently allows a hybrid working culture, wherein 50 per cent of the time employees are allowed to work from home.
